entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Looks like that woman from Michigan “Gretchen Whitmer” was right to keep the state closed down longer! Michigan death rate and positive Covid-19 infection are down dramatically! Guess where they’ve seen their biggest numbers yet? Florida, Arizona and Texas? Surprise, Surprise...
